title.0: Will Donald Trump visit Russia before July 1, 2025?

question_description.0: Wikipedia: [List of international presidential trips made by Donald Trump](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_international_presidential_trips_made_by_Donald_Trump)

question_resolution_criteria.0: This question resolves as **Yes** if, after May 19, 2025 and before July 1, 2025, President Donald Trump personally visits Russia.
